Split transects into train and validation sets

Source: R/unet_spatial_train_val_split.R
unet_spatial_train_val_split.Rd

Split transects into train and validation sets

Usage

unet_spatial_train_val_split(transects, holdout_col, cv, val, test)

Arguments

transects

Original sf transects object

holdout_col

Index of holdout set to use, picks from bypoly01 to bypoly05

cv

Number of cross-validations. Use 1 for a single model, up to 5 for five-fold

val

Validation polys from holdout_col. Use NULL to skip validation, or a vector of the validation polys for the first cross-validation (these will be incremented for subsequent validations). For 20% validation holdout, use val = c(1, 6). This will use bypoly01 %in% c(1,6)`` for the first cross-validation, c(2, 7)` for the second, and so on.

test

Test polys from holdout_col, as with val.

Value

List with train and val transect ids
